text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump @HHSGov How about he keeps his paycheck and gives back the billions of dollars that him and his crime family are grifting now he wants to take Coronavirus money for his fucking hotels.. tell him to shove his paycheck up his ass he's going to be in prison or hell soon enough
